doc.field: Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera
Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera
Series V. Holiday Greeting Cards, Invitations & Miscellaneous Posters
Series V. Holiday Greeting Cards, Invitations & Miscellaneous Posters

The series includes exhibition announcements that take the form of invitations to openings, a few holiday cards, and some miscellaneous prints, posters and other material not related to art exhibitions. The latter miscellany are listed by item in the container list.
